i enjoy reading and walking on sunny days.
I love the smell of beans, but my stomach doesn't.
I remember watching the Olympics with my family and dreaming of being an Olympian myself.
my favorite band is radiolead.

Baseball helps me to relax and temporarily forget about my anxiety.
i read tons of books.
i love reading mysteries in my free time.
I would brag about my violin skills to my friends if I was famous.
i ve been divorced for 2 years.

content.text: Hi, I'm Sarah! What's your name?
Hello, my name is Jake!
Nice to meet you, Jake! What do you like to do for fun?
I like to read, watch baseball, and play the violin. What about you?
I like to read, go for walks, and watch the Olympics.
Oh, I love the Olympics! I used to dream of being an Olympian myself.
Really? What event would you have competed in?
I think I would have been a gymnast. I love the way they flip and fly through the air.
That would be amazing! I bet you would have been great at it.
Thanks! I hope so.
So, what do you do for work?
I'm a librarian. I love reading and helping people find books.
That's awesome! I love libraries. They're so peaceful and quiet.
Me too! I love spending hours browsing the shelves and finding new books to read.
I'm the same way. I love the smell of books and the feeling of turning the pages.
Me too! I've been reading since I was a little kid.
Me too! I remember reading my favorite book over and over again.
What was your favorite book?
It was called The Secret Garden.
I've never read that one. What's it about?
It's about a little girl who finds a secret garden in her uncle's house.
That sounds like a great book! I'll have to check it out.
I hope you like it!
Thanks! I'm sure I will.
